author: Bellular News
description:
Assassin's Creed Shadow... did what it needed to. Ubisoft survived. But this was never about saving the company—it was about saving the family that owns it.

Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!

00:00 This Is A Family Story
00:55 1,200 Layoffs Weren't Enough
01:58 The Investors Smelled Blood
04:13 At Dawn, Yves Looked East
06:35 The €1.16 Billion Loophole
08:40 Everything Must Go
10:10 The Disgraced Son Returns
12:24 Shadows' Lead Was Pushed Out
14:04 Two More Years*

title: Ubisoft's Owners Escaped. Their Staff Didn't
